name: Security Audit
description: Performs systematic security audits covering OWASP top 10, dependency vulnerabilities, secrets detection, and access control review.

examples.prompt: Audit this web application for security vulnerabilities
examples.expected_behavior: Scans for injection flaws, auth bypass, XSS, CSRF, insecure deserialization, and produces a prioritized vulnerability report

examples.prompt: Check our dependencies for known CVEs
examples.expected_behavior: Analyzes dependency manifest files, identifies packages with known vulnerabilities, and recommends version upgrades or alternatives
